title: How to Activate Yeast For Wine

steps.title: Obtain a package of active dry wine yeast from a wine store.
steps.content: Obtain a package of active dry wine yeast from a wine store. Some grocery stores may have it as well.

steps.title: Pour the contents of the package of yeast into a container of tepid tap or spring water (100 to 105 degrees F; 37.7 to 40.6 degrees C); do not use distilled water.
steps.content: Pour the contents of the package of yeast into a container of tepid tap or spring water (100 to 105 degrees F; 37.7 to 40.6 degrees C); do not use distilled water.

steps.title: Stir gently, cover and let stand at room temperature or warmer.
steps.content: Stir gently, cover and let stand at room temperature or warmer.

steps.title: Check viability after 1/2 hour.
steps.content: Check viability after 1/2 hour. If bubbles appear, cover and allow to stand for 6 to 12 hours. If yeast is not viable, start over with fresh ingredients.("Viability" refers to the yeast being alive and able to reproduce.)

steps.title: After 6 to 12 hours, add yeast to must mixture.
steps.content: After 6 to 12 hours, add yeast to must mixture.

steps.title: Activate yeast in warm water as above and let stand for 1/2 hour at room temperature or warmer.
steps.content: Activate yeast in warm water as above and let stand for 1/2 hour at room temperature or warmer.

steps.title: Check viability after 1/2 hour and, if viable, cover and let stand while preparing the starter.
steps.content: Check viability after 1/2 hour and, if viable, cover and let stand while preparing the starter. If yeast is not viable, start over with fresh ingredients.

steps.title: In a separate container with lid, prepare the starter using 1/4 cup (59.2 ml) strained must or pre-sweetened fruit juice.
steps.content: In a separate container with lid, prepare the starter using 1/4 cup (59.2 ml) strained must or pre-sweetened fruit juice. steps.title: Add the viable water-yeast mixture to the starter mixture.
steps.content: Add the viable water-yeast mixture to the starter mixture.

steps.title: Cover and let stand for 4 hours.
steps.content: Cover and let stand for 4 hours.

steps.title: After 4 hours, add another 1/4 cup (59.2 ml) of juice or strained must.
steps.content: After 4 hours, add another 1/4 cup (59.2 ml) of juice or strained must.

steps.title: Cover and let stand for another 4 hours.
steps.content: Cover and let stand for another 4 hours.
